properties.entry: SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , PHONE , RRN , EMAIL , ADDRESS , ENROLL_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , ASSIGN_TR , STATUS FROM MZYM_MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , PHONE , RRN , EMAIL , ADDRESS , ENROLL_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , STATUS FROM MZYM_MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ?
